scripts.build-api: cd ../api && yarn build && cd ../container && yarn unzip-api
scripts.docker-build-api: docker build -t quickgame-api-harness -f api.Dockerfile . && docker tag quickgame-api-harness:latest 114394156384.dkr.ecr.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/quickgame-api-harness
scripts.docker-build-site: docker build -t quickgame-site-harness -f site.Dockerfile . && docker tag quickgame-site-harness:latest 114394156384.dkr.ecr.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/quickgame-site-harness
scripts.docker-build-gameServer: docker build -t quickgame-gameserver-harness -f gameServer.Dockerfile . && docker tag quickgame-gameserver-harness:latest 114394156384.dkr.ecr.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/quickgame-gameserver-harness
scripts.docker-build: yarn docker-build-api && yarn docker-build-site && yarn docker-build-gameServer
scripts.docker-aws-setup: yarn docker-aws-setup-api && yarn docker-aws-setup-site && yarn docker-aws-setup-gameserver
scripts.docker-aws-login: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-west-2 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 114394156384.dkr.ecr.us-west-2.amazonaws.com
scripts.docker-aws-push: yarn docker-aws-push-api && yarn docker-aws-push-site && yarn docker-aws-push-gameServer
scripts.docker-aws-delete: yarn docker-aws-delete-api && yarn docker-aws-delete-site && yarn docker-aws-delete-gameServer
scripts.docker-first-time: yarn docker-aws-setup && yarn docker-build  && yarn docker-aws-login && yarn docker-aws-push
scripts.docker-deploy: yarn docker-build  && yarn docker-aws-login && yarn docker-aws-push
